divs: sighting detailsgot out of bed to use the bathroom and get a drink at 1 am. going from bathroom to the kitchen i noticed a bright pulsating red light out of the front window of my house. i had to bend over to get a better look because it was almost hidden by the overhang of the front porch. i watched it for a couple minutes and did not see any movement. i went into the kitchen to get a drink with the intention of going out onto the front porch to get a better look. when i returned a minute later the light was gone. the light was the bright red type like you see pulsating on the top of radio\ cell towers. it was north of my house at an unknown distance. it didn't move while i was watching it. then it was gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mosheim
This sighting has never been favorited.
